messages.title: A message from Nick Clegg
messages.content: Gordon Brown and Labour have failed. We need real change in Britain and we need it NOW. Only the Liberal Democrats can offer that change. Unlike the Conservatives, we have real solutions to tackle the problems facing our country.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: You will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes, £2.5 billion extra for schools and scrap university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: create Jobs by making Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and home insulation.
Make politicians work for you and give YOU the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.education: Investing in schools to cut class sizes.
issues.environment: Making Britain Greener. We believe that going green can help us out of the recession now in driving growth, technologies of the future. It would also bring new jobs and improve the quality of people's lives.
issues.governance: Change that works for you. Building a fairer Britain.

housing.content: Supporting local businesses. Liberal Democrats will invest in post offices and freeze council tax with Treasury borrowing controls, so it can invest.

politicalExperience.achievements: Served on the cabinet of Wyre Forest District Council and leads for the opposition. Health ICT Services and also the local post offices, the restoration of Droitwich Lido and the canals, to reduce motorway noise, for adequate flood alleviation measures and has successfully taken up many issues on behalf of residents.

endorsements.endorser: Nick Clegg MP & Vince Cable MP
endorsements.endorsement: The Lib Dem Difference. The Lib Dems have costed plans to put £3,000 more into public education and cut tax by £700 for millions of people across Britain.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain.
Margaret Rowley - Your Local Liberal Democrat Candidate.
A record of action. Investing in our future.
Four steps to a fairer Britain.
